attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As the Tolls where to be removed when the crossing was paid for(2003). An ack of parliment was needed to continue the Tolls. This money in not used locally.
The cost of running the crossing would be dramatically reduced by removing the toll boths and having four controlled lanes, through the tunnels and over the bridge.
This would reduce congestion, reduce pollotion. This would benifit local population the general motorist and industry all at the same time!

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Scrap the Dartford crossing Toll."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page10944.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Scrap-the-Tolls/
